property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices all permanents they control that are one or more colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets." - Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +10/+10 and has trample and annihilator 2. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barest taste of Eldrazi power shatters both realms and identities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. When you cast this spell, take an extra turn after this one. Flying, protection from spells that are one or more colors, annihilator 6 When Emrakul, the Aeons Torn is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may sacrifice four Eldrazi Spawn rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I believed in a beautiful god. But this is the true face of the divine." - Ayli, Kamsa cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, draw four cards. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Kozilek, Butcher of Truth is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Whenever an opponent sacrifices a nontoken permanent, put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your pleas for death shall go unheard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell or ability that targets a permanent you control. This spell costs {7} less to cast if it targets a spell or ability that targets a creature you control with power 7 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents.) Pathrazer of Ulamog can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No thought but hunger. No strategy but destruction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create five 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The brood spread far faster than we could kill it. I fear the worst is yet to come." - The War Diaries

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilator 1 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.) {4}: Create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}." {20}: Cast any number of Eldrazi spells from among cards you own outside the game without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, destroy target permanent. Indestructible Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us." - Nirthu, lone missionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 2/2 LEVEL 5+ 5/5 First strike

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {8}: Tap all creatures target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What we knew as Emeria, Ula, and Cosi were not divine beings at all, but a cruel trick, and a grave error." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}{W}: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I should have died that day, but I suffered not a scratch. I awoke in a lake of blood, none of it apparently my own." - The War Diaries

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Singing City was silent, the pathway stones were still, and the winds of the Howling Spire ceased.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+4. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. −2: Destroy target tapped creature. [0]: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no contract to sign, no oath to swear. The enlistment procedure is to unsheathe your sword and point it at the enemy."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After encasing it in a paralyzing beam of light, the angel studied the Eldrazi as a child would study a bug, curiously and without fear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 1/4 If a source would deal damage to you or a creature you control, prevent 1 of that damage. LEVEL 5+ 2/5 If a source would deal damage to you or a creature you control, prevent 2 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 2/6 Vigilance LEVEL 4+ 3/10 Vigilance

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-4 3/6 Other creatures you control get +1/+1. LEVEL 5+ 4/8 Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 2/3 Flying LEVEL 4+ 4/4 Flying, vigilance

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Tap target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I tried to tell her to stay behind, that this fight was too dangerous. I spent the next hour tied to the rafters." - Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it. Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She reaches beyond the physical realm, touching the ideals from which all creatures draw their power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more creatures attack, Lightmine Field deals damage to each of those creatures equal to the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to kill a lot of goblins, just make sure your defenses look like fun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If destiny's champions have arisen to fight the Ancient Ones, then let me, too, do my part." - Ravuel of Graypelt

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has vigilance. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature token for each creature you control. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘Invincible' is just a word." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The vampires knew what was coming. I know it. And they did nothing. They deserve to feel the same agony they've caused all of us." - Anitan, Ondu cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap up to two target creatures. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mighty rely solely on their strength. They are shocked when we do the same." - Tars Olan, kor world-gift

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In truth, her own faith was gone, trodden in Ulamog's wake. She pantomimed the blessing in the hope that it would inspire others to continue to struggle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor's most righteous dead are given the greatest reward: an eternity tied to the land they so cherish.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Other creatures you control with defender get +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold fast the line! Either we stop them here or we wake up in their guts!" - Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {W} ({W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-6 3/3 First strike LEVEL 7+ 4/4 Double strike

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control with a level counter on it gets +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one spoke. There was no need. The threat of the Eldrazi presented a simple choice: lay down your weapons and die for nothing, or hold them fast and die for something.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor track hartebeests in hopes of finding magic to help fight the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {1} ({1}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 6-11 6/6 Lifelink LEVEL 12+ 9/9 Lifelink, indestructible

property.name: Rules
property.value: Auras attached to permanents you control have totem armor. (If an enchanted permanent you control would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy an Aura attached to it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have found the courage to face death - twice, if I must."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I search for a vision of Zendikar that does not include the Eldrazi." - Expedition journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach target Aura you control to target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Although armor and auras can be similar, the brains required to use them are worlds apart." - Zilan, Makindi auramancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you control have rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves if you cast it from your hand. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Champion's Drake gets +3/+3 as long as you control a creature with three or more level counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Fraid of heights? Ride a horse. 'Fraid of missing out? Rein up a drake." - Trinda, Hada spy patrol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {1} ({1}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 3/3 Flying LEVEL 4+ 4/4 Flying Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {2}{U}: Untap enchanted creature. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a land you control to its owner's hand. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That would have brought shame to you as a mage. Tell you what - I'll keep your secret." - Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, sacrifice Domestication.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Dormant Gomazoa enters the battlefield tapped. Dormant Gomazoa doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you become the target of a spell, you may untap Dormant Gomazoa.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {1}{U} ({1}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 2/4 {U}{U}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. LEVEL 4+ 2/5 {U}{U}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {1}{U} ({1}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 0/1 {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. LEVEL 3+ 0/1 {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To distract an archmage would take incredible power. But for a simpleton, something sparkly will do." - Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {8}: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thought Zendikar's rage was kindled by its explorers and plunderers. But the world had sensed the stirrings of the Eldrazi." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with flying get +2/+0. Creatures without flying get -2/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As they awakened, the Eldrazi reasserted their mastery over all of Zendikar's natural forces.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Guard Gomazoa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lingers near the outposts of the Makindi Trenches, inadvertently granting another layer of defense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/2 Hada Spy Patrol can't be blocked. LEVEL 3+ 3/3 Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Hada Spy Patrol can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 0/6 LEVEL 5+ 6/6 Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yeah, they've got a lot of meat. The only downside to eating 'em is that you often find human bones and body parts inside." - Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Look at its controller's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's good to learn from your failures, but I prefer to learn from the failures of others." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {U} ({U}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 4-6 2/4 LEVEL 7+ 3/5 At the beginning of each end step, if it's not your turn, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Merfolk Observer enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The structure gets bigger every hour, with hedrons coalescing even deep under the surface. If I could only get inside . . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Merfolk Skyscout attacks or blocks, untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Emeria is a pleasant lie, a figment to hide Emrakul's hideous face. I can only hope to uncover a truth that lies deeper still."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd build an entire fortress of them if I could." - Mzali, Lighthouse archmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us." - Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Phantasmal Abomination becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Create an illusion so strong that it becomes another's reality, and you can become the master of all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Tap X target permanents. • Untap X target permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the moment the first Eldrazi spawn squirmed free, everything on Zendikar took on an adjusted meaning, a new slant toward or away from the waking giants.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in target opponent's hand. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never look too deep, where the waters turn dark. What the sea has hidden there may not stay down forever." - Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Renegade Doppelganger become a copy of that creature until end of turn. (If it does, it loses this ability for the rest of the turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To truly know a creature, slither a mile in its tentacles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap four untapped creatures you control. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Riches must be divided, but real wealth can be shared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/2 Flying LEVEL 3+ 4/2 Flying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A riddle is nothing more than a trap for small minds, baited with the promise of understanding."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Surrakar Spellblade. Whenever Surrakar Spellblade deals combat damage to a player, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Under the master's eye, skills are honed sharper and spells cut deeper.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're glad to be of service - to be an audience to your failure." - Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The unfathomable is upon us, students. I have no doubt you will rise to the occasion."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Arrogant Bloodlord blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with power 1 or less, destroy Arrogant Bloodlord at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would rather take my own head than be thwarted by a presumptuous wretch with a shield and a dream."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, again it does not bode well for you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy each creature with mana value 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why does it destroy? It does, and to talk of reasons wastes time and breath." - Nirthu, lone missionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp. Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Na Plateau is lost. Do not ask what happened, and never return there." - Nirthu, lone missionary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. Create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Curse of Wizardry enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must all push through the pain to heal our world." - Ayli, Kamsa cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Death Cultist: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death inevitably seduces all who study it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Morality is just shorthand for the constraints of being powerless." - Ob Nixilis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {X}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-X until end of turn and Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If our former masters would have us kneel again, they shall feel our defiance slashed across their membranes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dread Drone enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink Whenever Escaped Null blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left masterless by Kozilek, it wandered the wilds, raving in its ceaseless hunger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 3 life. You gain 3 life and create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eldrazi grow wherever something else dies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scavengers both mundane and magical follow in its wake, feeding on the scraps of flesh and spirit it leaves behind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-3 2/2 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. LEVEL 4+ 4/4 {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Hellcarver Demon deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice all other permanents you control and discard your hand. Exile the top six cards of your library. You may cast any number of spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the angel saw was her doom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You will scream out your innermost secrets just to make it stop.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Last Kiss deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Romanticize it, glamorize it, call it what you will. To me, it will always be carnal, bloody murder." - Ayli, Kamsa cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mortician Beetle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To evade the brood lineages, one must be made dark to all the senses." - Traga, Zulaport runner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 4/3 Deathtouch LEVEL 3+ 5/4 First strike, deathtouch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}. {B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hate is an everlasting wellspring from which it is eternally sustained.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/2 LEVEL 4+ 7/3 {B}: Regenerate Null Champion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Pawn of Ulamog or another nontoken creature you control dies, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player shuffles that card into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It removed only one idea from her mind: defiance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}: Pestilence Demon deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have schemed too long to be supplanted by dead gods. If I cannot have this world, no one can."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player's life total becomes the lowest life total among all players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sorin has gathered grudges for centuries, patiently awaiting the day he can exact the perfect vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever killed insects nibbling at your crops? I think that's what the Eldrazi believe they're doing to us." - Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Necromancers are judged by the most powerful undead they've ever created. There are those who have animated just a single being, yet are considered the pinnacle of their dark craft.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ulamog's tentacles, their touch like burning ice, rummaged through his soul and stung his memories one by one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Thought Gorger enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card in your hand. If you do, discard your hand. When Thought Gorger leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Consider my debt to your kin paid in full." - Idrol, Guul Draz assassin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It haunts the remnants of the Helix of Zof, leeching strength from the vast Eldrazi ruin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {4} ({4}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 3/3 LEVEL 3+ 5/5 Zulaport Enforcer can't be blocked except by black creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Akoum Boulderfoot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're in Akoum and you glimpse a shadow overhead, the worst thing you can do is duck." - Chadir the Navigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword." - Yannash, outpost builder

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {3}{R} ({3}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-2 2/3 {T}: Brimstone Mage deals 1 damage to any target. LEVEL 3+ 2/4 {T}: Brimstone Mage deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control an Eldrazi Spawn, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}." Otherwise, create one of those tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Conquering Manticore enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It speaks no commands but is always obeyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice X lands. Create two X/X red Elemental creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Things born in magma are always angry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. Disaster Radius deals X damage to each creature your opponents control, where X is the revealed card's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose any target. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Explosive Revelation deals damage equal to that card's mana value to that permanent or player. Put the nonland card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Something down there has an appetite for what we're standing on. Let's hope it doesn't want seconds." - Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flame Slash deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After millennia asleep, the Eldrazi had forgotten about Zendikar's fiery temper and dislike of strangers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forked Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Play no favorites. Everybody dies." - Sparkmage saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins." - Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Grotag Siege-Runner: Destroy target creature with defender. Grotag Siege-Runner deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't think he's bringing in the mail . . . ." - Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth." - Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then create that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just when you thought you'd be safe, in the middle of an open field with no Eldrazi around for miles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {R} ({R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 4-7 4/4 Flying LEVEL 8+ 8/8 Flying, trample {R}: Kargan Dragonlord gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tracing their ancestry back to Zendikar's earliest forms of life, lagac lizards have seen the comings and goings of planeswalkers and the Eldrazi, and the rise of the vampire clans, none of which has changed them one bit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Then the ancient masters themselves, towers of rapacity, rose and began their calamitous feast." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-5 6/6 LEVEL 6+ 6/6 Whenever Lord of Shatterskull Pass attacks, it deals 6 damage to each creature defending player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Lust for War deals 3 damage to that creature's controller. Enchanted creature attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a nonland permanent: Magmaw deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw." - Jaji, magmaw worshipper

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have to appreciate the genius of it. Why bother building defenses when you can just fill the pass with angry ogres?" - Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying {1}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The settlement knew there was something strange about the cloud when the old priest Mandli suddenly grabbed an axe and ran screaming into the hills.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins in the first wave of a fire raid always bemoan the aim of everyone else.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Rapacious One deals combat damage to a player, create that many 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Soulsurge Elemental's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It draws its strength from those around it, but the pleasure of destruction is all its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spawning Breath deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death by death, Kozilek's lineage spread.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a token that's a copy of this creature, except it has haste. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know just the person for that job."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Staggershock deals 2 damage to any target. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return an instant card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The horror lurched about like a puppet from a madman's nightmare, squeezing the life from its own kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, create Tuktuk the Returned, a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Remade by Eldrazi magic, Tuktuk inspired an entire clan of misguided goblins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Valakut Fireboar attacks, switch its power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just move very slowly, and for the love of Ula, do not get it mad." - Chadir the Navigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone." - The War Diaries

property.name: Rules
property.value: After the first postcombat main phase this turn, there's an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed." - The War Diaries

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it. Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground erupted in time with the hedron's thrum, a dirge of the last days.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {2}{G} ({2}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-3 4/4 LEVEL 4+ 6/6 Trample

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From in here, everything looks like dinner."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Tap an untapped creature you control: Bramblesnap gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bramblesnap is formed by grafting together thirteen different plants that already hunger for meat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eldrazi Spawn creatures you control get +2/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The least of gods shall tower over the mightiest of mortals, and death shall reign over all." - Crypt of Agadeem inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?" - Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X X/X green Ooze creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even as the world was left cracked and gory by the marauding Eldrazi, new life began to drip from its wounds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Target creature you control has base power and toughness 7/7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All life is driven by an indomitable will to survive. I simply turn that into something more . . . tangible."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with flying attacks, it loses flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storms spread throughout Oran-Rief, ripping the skies with wind and rain. Airborne creatures sought shelter where they could.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Haze Frog enters the battlefield, prevent all combat damage that other creatures would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its breath leaves its prey too drowsy to struggle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The baloth's instincts boiled, its muscles pulled taut, and its razor-spines bristled, as it turned to face - a runt meepling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Jaddi Lifestrider enters the battlefield, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 2 life for each creature tapped this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature's arms encircle all who are willing to draw close.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 1-4 1/2 {T}: Add {G}{G}. LEVEL 5+ 1/4 Elves you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.) LEVEL 2-5 1/1 {T}: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. LEVEL 6+ 1/1 {T}: Create two 3/3 green Elephant creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {G} less to cast for each green creature you control. Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In ages past, bargains were struck and promises were made. Now we must collect on our debt. Begin the hymns." - Moruul, Khalni druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Leaf Arrow deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who think the trees shall remain bystanders throughout this conflict shall be sorely mistaken." - Sutina, Speaker of the Tajuru

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand. You gain life equal to the revealed card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That our enemies are great only brings us greater hope."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. You draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It wasn't long until the elves had developed a use for every part of the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, Mul Daya Channelers gets +3/+3. As long as the top card of your library is a land card, Mul Daya Channelers has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scholars wept when we destroyed the hedron. I had no such pity. What would this world be like had we done so sooner?" - The War Diaries

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In one gargantuan bite, it will swallow not only you but also the riverbank you were standing on.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies." - The War Diaries

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It eats what it wants to eat - which is anything that moves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to four land cards with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They don't move much, but then again, if you get caught in its web, it has all the time in the world to get to you." - Saidah, Joraga hunter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This one is only a yearling, but it would be wise to move away before we provide it with excellent hunting practice." - Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No more blood shall be spilled to satisfy another's deluded lust for power."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leave but a shred of root and it will return, bursting with vigor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us." - The Invokers' Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Sarkhan the Mad deals damage to himself equal to that card's mana value. −2: Target creature's controller sacrifices it, then that player creates a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. −4: Each Dragon creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many charge counters on Angelheart Vial. {2}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from Angelheart Vial: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It holds a whisper from Iona: "Persevere."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Enatu Golem dies, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Golems conjured from the debris of Enatu Temple provided a sturdy but expendable first line of defense against the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is its mana value. Equip {4}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hedrons awoke along with the Eldrazi, forming superstructures that radiated overwhelming magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As it spins, dead voices shriek in an ever-increasing cacophony, rending the mind asunder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She adopted the weapon of the slave-lord Kazuul, and with it, all his cruelty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Draped with the pennon of a fallen outpost, the sword came to symbolize the peoples of Zendikar becoming one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The explorer who found it got a bad deal when he sold it. He merely got rich."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Built of wood and iron. Held together by hope and prayer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its host's final curse lies captured within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. As long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best defense is a good offense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each temple is a door to a horrible future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.
